hero.title: Deep Research at Your Fingertips
hero.subtitle: Meet DeerFlow, your personal Deep Research assistant. With powerful tools like search engines, web crawlers, Python and MCP services, it delivers instant insights, comprehensive reports, and even captivating podcasts.
hero.deerStandsFor: * DEER stands for Deep Exploration and Efficient Research.

coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.description: Find out what makes DeerFlow effective.

deeperResearch.name: Dive Deeper and Reach Wider
deeperResearch.description: Unlock deeper insights with advanced tools. Our powerful search + crawling and Python tools gathers comprehensive data, delivering in-depth reports to enhance your study.

humanInLoop.name: Human-in-the-loop
humanInLoop.description: Refine your research plan, or adjust focus areas all through simple natural language.

langStack.name: Lang Stack
langStack.description: Build with confidence using the LangChain and LangGraph frameworks.

mcpIntegrations.name: MCP Integrations
mcpIntegrations.description: Supercharge your research workflow and expand your toolkit with seamless MCP integrations.

podcastGeneration.name: Podcast Generation
podcastGeneration.description: Instantly generate podcasts from reports. Perfect for on-the-go learning or sharing findings effortlessly.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.description: See DeerFlow in action through replays.

footer.quote: Originated from Open Source, give back to Open Source.

welcome.description: Welcome to ðŸ¦Œ DeerFlow, a deep research assistant built on cutting-edge language models, helps you search on web, browse information, and handle complex tasks.

input.deepThinkingTooltip: When enabled, DeerFlow will use reasoning model ({model}) to generate more thoughtful plans.
input.investigationTooltip: When enabled, DeerFlow will perform a quick search before planning. This is useful for researches related to ongoing events and news.

reportStyle.title: Choose Writing Style
reportStyle.description: Select the writing style for your research reports. Each style is optimized for different audiences and purposes.
reportStyle.tooltip: Choose the writing style for your research reports. Different styles are optimized for different audiences and purposes.

academic.label: Academic
academic.description: Formal, objective, and analytical with precise terminology

popularScience.label: Popular Science
popularScience.description: Engaging and accessible for general audience

news.label: News
news.description: Factual, concise, and impartial journalistic style

general.title: General
general.maxPlanIterationsDescription: Set to 1 for single-step planning. Set to 2 or more to enable re-planning.
general.maxSteps: Max steps of a research plan
general.maxStepsDescription: By default, each research plan has 3 steps.
general.maxSearchResultsDescription: By default, each search step has 3 results.

validationErrors.minPlanIterations: Max plan iterations must be at least 1.
validationErrors.minSteps: Max step number must be at least 1.
validationErrors.minSearchResults: Max search results must be at least 1.

database.title: Database Management
database.description: Manage database connections and data sources for Text2SQL and other features.

datasources.title: Database Datasources
datasources.description: Manage your database connections for Text2SQL and data analysis.
datasources.noResultsDescription: No datasources match your current filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
datasources.emptyDescription: Get started by creating your first database datasource.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Datasource
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

apiManagement.title: API Management
apiManagement.description: Manage API definitions and monitor API calls.

messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete API "{name}"?

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.description: The Model Context Protocol boosts DeerFlow by integrating external tools for tasks like private domain searches, web browsing, food ordering, and more. Click here to

text2sql.title: Text2SQL Training
text2sql.description: Train AI models to convert natural language questions into SQL queries

datasource.title: Database Datasource
datasource.description: Select a database datasource to train Text2SQL models
datasource.noDataSources: No database datasources found. Please create a datasource first in the Database Management tab.
